item.title: Can you have a good life without kids?
item.description: Absolutely, you can have a very fulfilling and happy life without having children. The idea that having children is a requirement for a good life is a societal norm, but it's important to remember that happiness and fulfillment are deeply personal and can be achieved through a variety of paths.
